examples.example: 我最近读了一本非常精彩的小说，它让我沉浸在奇妙的故事世界中。

translate.english: I recently read a very wonderful novel, which made me immersed in the wonderful story world.

examples.example: 我很喜欢在闲暇时光阅读各种有趣的小说，它们让我的生活更加丰富多彩。

translate.english: I really like to read all kinds of interesting novels in my spare time, and they make my life more colorful.

examples.example: 我经常沉浸在精彩的小说中，感受着不同的人生百态。

translate.english: I often immerse myself in wonderful novels, feeling different vicissitudes of life.
